column3:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13825 ([wallet] Kill accounts by jnewbery)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

I just encountered this "unknown wallet records" issue today when running the latest 0.17.1 (upgraded from 0.17.0). Not sure bitcoincore's backport policy but it seems to me it would be nice to have this simple fix on 0.17.2.
